name: My Canvas Shortcode
author: Name of the plugin author

sections.description:
dippi stands for Digital Image Processing PlugIn and provides basic operations and masks for image manipulation.

Features:
* Point Operations (brightness, contrast, gamma)
* Grayscale Operations (Grayscale, Threshold)
* Blurring Masks (mean, weighted average, Gaussian mask, median filter)
* Edge Detection Masks (Laplacian, Prewitt, Rrobinson, Sobel, Kirsch)
* Miscellaneous (Inverse Colours, Sepia, Noise)
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder dippi to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the [dippi] shortcode to add the plugin to your post
